name: Black Abyss - Nicaragua - HydraÂ
additionalNotes: Produced in the famous NACSA factory in Nicaragua, the Black Abyss Nicaragua cigar is crafted with a Mexican San Andres binder, Nicaraguan Habano long fillers, and a gorgeous Ecuador Sumatra wrapper. This wonderful follow up to the original Dominican Black Abyss, provides rich medium to full bodied flavors of espresso, spice, and earth, backed by a long-lasting creamy finish.
